Introduction

I1IT (Korean: 아이원잇; Japanese: アイウォニット) is a boy group that debuted on August 25, 2022, with their single “SUPER FLY.” They are active in both Japan and South Korea. Following their debut, I1IT released the Korean version of “SUPER FLY”.

Takuto left I1IT on November 26, 2023. It is assumed that Syoma has left the group as well sometime in 2023.
